sources.title: Gardenia il giustiziere della mala (Gardenia) (1979) Crime, Drama | Movie, Subtitles
sources.description:
It's kill or be killed in the mafia, They said it with bullets... He said it with flowers.
In the city of Rome lives Gardenia, a respected exponent of Roman organized crime.

Original title: Gardenia il giustiziere della mala
Director: Domenico Paolella 
Stars: Franco Califano, Martin Balsam, Robert Webber
Genres:  Crime, Drama
